comment: Tests are easy if you pay attention, and you don't have to take the final if you like your grade. She likes to talk about how "bad" she eats but works out whenever she isn't teaching. Almost no point in reaching her outside of class since she doesn't do office hours, appointment only. Had some labs, but are easy and don't require much thought

Lola is very patient and helpful.  I would definitely take her again.  HPS 2090 is Exercise Leadership, but it really was about aerobics and how to teach it.  Read the chapters and STUDY THE CHAPTER QUESTIONS and you'll do well.
I thinks she's a good prof. Tests are not hard, if you read a book. Do your labs and turn them in, you'll do fine. You don't have to take the final test if you're satisfied with your overall scores.

for some reason i thought she was disorganized..well she's alright and takes attendance. She will be tricky on her 2nd test(with surprise material not on the study guide),gives you long ass study guides and asks very few questions off of them. NO opportunity for extra credit:(! It hasn't yet hit her that NOT evry1 wishes to be an exercise leader!!

Took her for Ex Leadership and while she seems to know what she is talking about, it is obvious that it is just a job to her. From the first day of class, she kept telling us that she would be gone when her daughter had her baby. First test - very easy, second test - very difficult, third test - ok. Takes attendance and must attend exercise classes

This class was horrible.. all she talked about was how she can "carry her own suitcases and put them in the plane compartment all by herself!!" This class is a joke. She makes you not want to attend, which then hurts your grade. Its awful NOT recommended AT ALL!!!

She is a great professor! I had her for Exercise Leadership, 2090, and she made it a very fun and interesting class. She is aware that not everyone wants to be an exercise leader and she makes it a class that is fun for those who are not interested in it. Recommend HIGHLY!

Boring class. Many lectures and a ton of notes. Class attendance isnt mandatory but you never know when there is an activity or assignment day which is a part of your grade. Calculated my final grade wrong and had to get it changed from a B to A so make sure to keep an eye on your own grade. Very nice teacher overall.
Tests are really hard, and the class is really boring. She lectures everyday and you work out like twice the whole semester.

Good teacher. Class was a boring, but it's general ed..what do you expect. Lectures we're helpful. Teaches straight from the book. Easy class overall if you pay attention and DO THE LABS! Solid teacher overall.

this class was pretty ridiculous. she tried to make it fun and tolerable but i think it'd only be interesting to people that are actually interested in doing it for a living. she was pretty sketchy about everything, labs, activity days... cancelled/changed class randomly... i'd look around before you settle on this one.

Way harder than ever expected.Should be an upper level class.She lectures a lot but moves too fast to ever get a full concept down in your notes.Labs are rediculously long, tests are really hard.You really have to use your text book. THIS IS NOT A PE CLASS! We had like 4 activity days all semester.  Attendance doesn't matter. NOT RECOMMENDED!!!!
the worst class ive ever taken. is ridiculously hard for a 1000 level class. most of the material isnt taught in class and you can hardly find it in your book.
BORING!!!  lot of notes, hard tests, lectures alot, grades based on athelic ability
Swimming coach, has a lot of work for students, but is fair, study hard, it stinks putting effort towards HPS but it has to be done...
Good teacher but she gives a lot of work for a PE class, lectures a lot
